Reviews.Title: “Small rooms, small price, good value”
Reviews.Author: Ratisbonensis
Reviews.Content: hotel situated busy business istanbul 15 mins metro taksim square perfectly adequate breakfast buffet tasty prices acceptable staff hotel owner nice helpful short walk upmarket shopping centre plenty international shops restaurants choose local eateries corner recommend
